creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: profile bust of a male figure facing R with tall hat, long white beard, and coat
provenance: Pierre Mariette II, 1678; Ernst Theodor Rodenacker, Dantzig; Berlin Print Room, deaccessioned as duplicate, 1886('); Paul Davidsohn, Grunewald-Berlin; [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, March 5, 1985; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Bust of an Old Man with a High Cap
